typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared nyctaxi_source = let
  AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://lgndatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/US/nyctaxi/2016/yellow_tripdata_2016-06.txt?sv=2018-03-28&sig=FCsfMni4FIk2adPW9bMcS7P5cC4pOpIRnGHfCV9sBvg%3D&spr=https&se=2019-09-25T21%3A20%3A59Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.None]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true]),
  TrimmedHeaders = Table.TransformColumnNames(PromotedHeaders, (columnName as text) as text => Text.Trim(columnName))
in
  TrimmedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = nyctaxi_source
in
  Source;
